message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe you'll find it to be a great addition to your collection. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.
Alice, I appreciate your offer but $1500000 is above my budget. I'm very interested in the product, and I'm willing to pay $1100000.  Let's see if we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

I understand you're interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to make a serious offer. However, I need to consider the value I've placed on this product, and I'm not willing to go as low as $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1300000.

Alice, I understand your position, but $1300000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $1200000, which is my absolute maximum. If you're not able to accept that, I may have to consider other options. Let's see if we can reach a deal.

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob, but I'm still not willing to accept $1200000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm counteroffering at $1350000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
